#Code by Paul Mooney: https://www.kaggle.com/paultimothymooney/poetry-generator-rnn-markov

import numpy as np
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline
def plotWordFrequency(input):
    f = open(bangla_file,'r')
    words = [x for y in [l.split() for l in f.readlines()] for x in y]
    data = sorted([(w, words.count(w)) for w in set(words)], key = lambda x:x[1], reverse=True)[:40] 
    most_words = [x[0] for x in data]
    times_used = [int(x[1]) for x in data]
    plt.figure(figsize=(20,10))
    plt.bar(x=sorted(most_words), height=times_used, color = 'grey', edgecolor = 'black',  width=.5)
    plt.xticks(rotation=45, fontsize=18)
    plt.yticks(rotation=0, fontsize=18)
    plt.xlabel('Most Common Words:', fontsize=18)
    plt.ylabel('Number of Occurences:', fontsize=18)
    plt.title('Most Commonly Used Words: %s' % (bangla_file), fontsize=24)
    plt.show()
